text: wadhkr -ayha alnby- qawl taayifat min almunafiqin mnadyn almuminin min 'ahl "almdyn": ya 'ahl "ythrb"(whw alaism alqadim "llmdyn") la 'iiqamat lakum fi maerakat khasrt, farjieuu 'iilaa mnazlkm dakhil "almdyn", wayastadhin fariq akhar min almunafiqin alrasul salaa allah ealayh wasalam bialeawdat 'iilaa manaziluhum bihujat 'anaha ghyr mhsnt, fykhshwn elyha, walhaqa 'anaha laysat kdhlk, wama qsdu bdhlk 'iilaa alfirar min alqtal
